botan.tls.blocking

TLS Blocking API

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

abstract class TLSBlockingClient;
Blocking TLS Client

final void doHandshake();
Completes full handshake then returns

final const size_t pending();
Number of bytes pending read in the plaintext buffer (bytes readable without blocking)

final size_t read(ubyte* buf, size_t buf_len);
Blocking read, will return at least 1 ubyte or 0 on connection close

protected abstract bool handshakeComplete(ref const TLSSession);
Can to get the handshake complete notification override

protected abstract void alertNotification(in TLSAlert);
Can to get notification of alerts override
